analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi
sani dassana ttika hetu hetu sampayutta duka

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham hetuñca iva hetu sampayuttañca dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ

original: nahetu ceva nahetuvippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā
analyzed: na hetu ca iva na hetu vippayuttaḥ ca dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ hetusampayuttañceva na ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham hetu sampayuttam ca iva na ca hetum dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ

original: nahetuvippayutto ceva nanahetu ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā
analyzed: na hetu vippayuttaḥ ca iva na na hetu ca dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā
